title: Non Violent Incarcerated Individuals in New York

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Under the New York State Freedom of Information Law (Public Officers Law §§ 84-90), I hereby request access to and copies of records detailing the current population of incarcerated individuals within state-operated facilities under the following categories:

The total number of individuals currently incarcerated for non-violent offenses, including a breakdown by each specific offense.
Detailed information on those incarcerated for drug-related offenses, including:
The specific type of drug-related offense (e.g., possession, distribution, manufacturing).
The quantity of the substance involved in the conviction, where applicable.
The sentencing length for each individual convicted of drug-related offenses.
Demographic information including age, race, and gender.
Statistical data on the recidivism rates of individuals incarcerated for non-violent, drug-related offenses.
I believe that the release of this information is in the public interest as it provides essential insights into the state's criminal justice system, particularly concerning the impact of drug policy and incarceration on communities. This information will contribute to ongoing public discussions and policy-making processes aimed at criminal justice reform.

Please provide the information in an electronic format if available, or printed copies if not digitally accessible. 

I am aware that there may be costs associated with the retrieval and copying of these records. I am willing to pay fees for this request up to a maximum of $1000. Please notify me prior to your incurring any expenses exceeding this amount.

Additionally, I request a waiver of all fees associated with this request as the release of this information is not for commercial use but is intended to contribute significantly to public understanding of the operations and activities of the government, particularly regarding issues of public interest such as criminal justice reform.

Please inform me within five business days of the receipt of this request about the status of my request. If you deny any or all of this request, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and notify me of the appeal procedures available under the law.

Thank you for your consideration of this request.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Subject: Freedom of Information Act Request

Dear Freedom of Information Officer,

I am writing to request information under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA), [5 U.S.C. § 552] regarding inmates currently held in solitary confinement within the state of New York or in federal correctional facilities.

Please provide the following information for each inmate:

1. The total number of inmates held in solitary confinement.
2. The name of the facility where each inmate is held.
3. The duration for which each inmate has been in solitary confinement.
4. The reasons provided for placing each inmate in solitary confinement.

If some of this information is available in an aggregated or anonymized format, I would accept that format to protect privacy and security while still providing oversight of the use of solitary confinement.

I am willing to pay fees for this request up to a maximum of $1000. Please inform me if the estimated fees will exceed this limit before processing my request.

Additionally, I request a waiver of all fees for this request. Disclosure of the requested information is in the public interest because it provides significant insight into governmental operations and activities specifically related to the treatment of inmates in the state of New York and federal correctional facilities. This information is not being sought for commercial purposes.

I look forward to your response within the statutory 20 working day period as outlined in the FOIA.

Thank you for considering my request.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Trevor Davis
